message.content:
cs.NI, cs.IT, cs.LG, cs.SY, cs.CR 

The paper deals with optimizing network coding in mobile networks with intermittent connectivity, which is a problem in the field of computer networks (cs.NI). It also involves the use of random linear network coding (RLNC), which is a topic in information theory (cs.IT). The paper proposes an enhanced forwarding protocol, which involves machine learning techniques such as reinforcement learning, which falls under the category of machine learning (cs.LG). The paper also deals with the optimization of network resources, which is a topic in control systems (cs.SY) and cryptography (cs.CR).
